text: I was alone. As I passed, I saw a station on the Paris subway that it was 12 o'clock at night. She was very unhappy about other things. Tears began to flow, silent. He was looking at me. He was a black man. We were both hanging, face to face. He looked at me tenderly, trying to comfort me. Strangers, without words. The look is the deepest thing there is. He held his eyes fixed on mine until the tears dried up. At the next station, he came down. FIN Underground river, 1979
title: Año nuevo
author: Inés Arredondo
